Who within your organization is willing to challenge you, your mindset, your assumptions and even your perspective? Who is keeping you on your toes; keeping you and your business relevant in today's ever-changing market?
Tech Giants Are Paying Huge Salaries for Scarce A.I. Talent
Step into a strategic leadership role by understanding what to say when and how to say it.

Christine K. Bailey leverages her experiences as a business strategist, communications expert and published author to help business owners and entrepreneurs define their business vision, build their systems and lead their teams for improved performance and profitability. She has almost 20 years experience developing communications strategies and sales and marketing systems to support business growth in the areas of banking, healthcare, digital health, real estate, meetings/events, software and hardware, training, and travel and tourism. Today, she coaches business owners in identifying the next phase and developing the infrastructure to support accelerated growth.
Lead strategic marketing and communications efforts for VC-backed start-up to bring digital health solution iChip to market.

As Director, Sales Operations of VC-backed start-up Telcare, Bailey developed the operational infrastructure, marketing efforts and content necessary to support a sales team in developing a multi-million dollar pipeline that included many of healthcare's largest stakeholders - health plans, health systems and large employer groups.

Bailey worked with EXL Landa, formerly known as Landacorp, to develop and integrate the sales processes and systems for sales operations from lead generation through sale close.  Bailey succeeded in automating processes, improving lead quality, increasing lead activity, improving sales resources, and increasing transparency and accountability via dashboard and reporting features in the organization's CRM system; effectively preparing the private-equity backed company for acquisition.

November 10, 2015, Christine was a client of Rick’s

It has been an absolute plesaure and an honor to participate in Conquest Training System's Presidents Club. I spent a year in the program learning the Sandler method, and much of that time was spent under Rick's guidance and mentorship. He created a safe environment for me to identify and address both personal and professional barriers to my success, and helped me excel signficantly in just a year's time. I owe much of that success to his nurturing and supportive approach, which helped me discover what was holding me back and learn the tools and techniques necessary to move beyond it. I have recommended the program to so many people. It truly has been life-changing. Thank you, Rick!

I found Deanna knowledgeable, enthusiastic and professional.  Her willingness to learn new aspects of the non-profit industry and take on challenging projects; her dedication to her clients and their goals; and her ability to understand and meet their needs, made her an ideal partner in our joint projects.  It was a pleasure working with her!

summary: Christine K. Bailey is a published author and business growth strategist with almost twenty years of experience. She specializes in harnessing the power of the written (and spoken) word to help companies effectively speak to their stakeholders – employees, customers, prospects, investors and partners -- to improve performance and profitability. A former small business owner, she has also led sales operations and marketing efforts for private equity- and venture capital-backed businesses to develop the strategies, processes and content necessary to build and nurture multi-million dollar sales pipelines. She is currently developing and implementing a city-wide business incubation and entrepreneurial development program for the City of Chandler and regularly coaches and mentors startup founders, business owners and executives to grow their businesses stronger, faster and smarter.
name: Christine (K.) Bailey
title: Writer, Entrepreneur, Business Growth Strategist
